exceptions_errors Module¶

platform:Unix
synopsis:Define the different exceptions specific to TFFMs that might be raised in the process of TFFM analyses.
exception exceptions_errors.TFFMKindError(value)[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Define the exception error needed to be raised when a TFFM is instanciated with a kind different from ‘1st-order’ and ‘detailed’.

Module author: Anthony Mathelier <amathelier@cmmt.ubc.ca>
